title: Bear Potion
desc:
Post 2088
- **Countdown** 12
- Upon activation, this card enters your Identity Zone, you discard the other cards in your hand, and draw two copies of (2088-1) Bear Maul, plus three random cards from post numbers 2088-2 through 2088-10
- While this is in your Identity Zone, you are only capable of drawing cards from post numbers 2088-1 through 2088-10
- If any effects would try to force you draw cards that aren't posts 2088-1 through 2088-10, you will immediately discard it and replace it with a random card from 2088-1 through 2088-10.
- For cards 2088-1 through 2088-10, the second number in their post number determines what kind of number card they count as. (i.e. 2088-4 is a 4 card.)
